title: The Night Before the Live - 1
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Ugh, Kanata-chan can’t fall asleep because she’s too excited~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kanata-san not being able to fall asleep? How......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Mmm, you should get a good night’s rest before the live concert......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Of course, Kanata-chan wants to sleep so that she’s energized for the live concert......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Oh yeah, I heard that it’s easier to fall asleep if your head is cool while your legs are warm.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>It’s supposed to make you feel more comfortable. I’ll rub Kanata-chan’s feet then......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’ll cool her down with this uchiwa fan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Thank you~ Hopefully, Kanata-chan can sleep now...... But this excitement might not stop so easily......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Zzz......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, it worked perfectly~ Alright, let’s get some sleep now too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Sure. Let’s do our best for the live concert!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
